post:
Hey everyone! 

It's this time of the year - time to save some money! And it is time for us to show you our Black Friday VPS deals!

##Black Friday Dedicated Servers Sale

If you are looking for our Dedicated Servers Black Friday Sale - you can find it in this thread - [Here](https://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/161701/stockservers-black-friday-dedis-vps-coming-soon)

##Black Friday VPS Sale

These are limited quantities, so get them while they are still available.

All VPS VMs will be deployed on Monday, December 2nd, 2019.

New Jersey SSD VPS:

<pre>
* CPU: 1 vCPU
* RAM: 256MB
* SSD: 5GB 
* Bandwidth: 1Gbps 500GB
* New Jersey, USA
</pre>

##Location Information

NJ - Test IP (23.226.128.10/2607:fcd0:ccc0:1000::2) - Test Files ([100MB](http://repos.ewr.lax-noc.com/speedtests/100mb.bin) [1GB](http://repos.ewr.lax-noc.com/speedtests/1gb.bin)) 
KC - Test IP (PM us or open a ticket)

##Additional Information
 
All services (excluding Kansas City) benefit from Quadranets 3Gbit VEST DDoS protection and benefit from their enterprise grade network. All dedicated servers are eligible for BGP sessions, as well as some eligible VPS VMs (contact us for more information) and bring your own IP. Our in-house dedicated server control panel is currently not available and is being worked on and should be ready in ~2 weeks to allow users to reboot, reinstall and manage their IPs.
